Class ClientManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.LM26.systemNetwork.serverNet.ClientManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObserverSimple, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientManagerRMI, ClientManagerSocket

    public abstract class ClientManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ObserverSimple
    ClientManager abstract class
    Author:
    Chiara Criscuolo Class that manages one connection for each client
